Plot: Rayne, the half-human/half-vampire warrior, ventures to America's 1880's Wild West to stop the vampired Billy the Kid and his posse of vampire cowboys.
Title: BloodRayne: Deliverance
Writer: Christopher Donaldson (story), Neil Every (story), Christopher Donaldson, Neil Every, Masaji Takei
Actors: Natassia Malthe, Zack Ward, Michael Paré, Chris Coppola
